name: Infinity Tumbling

criterias.normal: rhythm, flow, trajectory (no roll movement), tension in the lines and glider, duration, exit or connection
criterias.twisted: twisted on the entry, must stay twisted, untwist at exit and NOT during the turns
criterias.flip: body flip either forward or backwards during the Infinite Tumbling. Flip must begin and end at the same point of one full rotation

connection: Forbidden connection to Tumbling or Anti-Rhythmic SAT
